content: **notes ** directions are for 9-12 months changes for 18 and 24 months are in parentheses gauge 17 sts = 4 10 row = 4 in skirt pattern 16 sts = 4 16 row = 4 in single_crochet supplies - aunt lydia s® baby denim art 156 400 yard/365 meter balls 250 300 350 yards each no 1250 mint green ca and no 1001 white cb - crochet hook 5mm us h-8 - yarn needle - 4 snap sets - sewing needle and thread - two 5/8 buttons
